newsitem.title: USA: CBOT Sept T-bond futures rally on U.S. jobs data.
newsitem.headline: CBOT Sept T-bond futures rally on U.S. jobs data.

text.p: September U.S. Treasury bond futures traded at the Chicago Board of Trade rallied after June U.S. employment figures and briefly were up a full point in early pit trading.

The contract, which opened an abbreviated trading session firmer, rose to a peak of 113-03/32 after the figures, above a a key technical level at 112-24/32, the June 20 high. ((DerivativesDesk(312)408-8750)) E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
